name: Lorem Ipsum for WP Editor
tagline: Now you can test you website adding Lorem Ipsum text to your posts using this WordPress plugin
body:
### Installing
It's so easy to use in your website! You just need download and activate :)

### How it works
When you are creating/editing the post, you can choose how many paragraphs you want to add on your text. After choose, the Lorem Ipsum text will be added after the existent text.

### Improving
Do you want to help us? Fork this and give your skills to make it better and more useful!

### Authors and Contributors
I'm Janynne Gomes (@devnetgomez) and I have a [Facebook Page](http://www.facebook.com/DiarioDeUmaProgramadorA) to share my programmer daily.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
